title: Creamy herb dip
ingredients: ['175ml soured cream', '175ml mayonnaise', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons fresh parsley leaves', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh tarragon', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 anchovy fillets', '4 tablespoons finely chopped fresh chives', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
